segments.text: Your English has really improved in the two months you've been here , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have to work late at the computer company again tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I'm going to leave the office early today . My annual medical check-up is this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much longer will Mr . Schmidt be up in the mountains ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's on a weeklong meditation retreat and won't be back until this weekend .
segments.speaker: S1
